example.name: autogen1
example.text: when he advised Warner President Terry Semel of the Sony offer at lunch on Sept. 25 , Mr. Semel `` hugged and congratulated me , and expressed joy that we had finally realized our long-term ambition of running and having an equity position in a major entertainment company
example.arg: that we had finally realized our long-term ambition of running and having an equity position in a major entertainment company
